ModMetaData.name: Trade UI Revised
ModMetaData.author: Hob Took
ModMetaData.description:
Reorganizes the trade UI into a two-column layout to make it clear what items the colony has vs trader has, who is trading, and how much it will cost.
-Right-click on the "<" and ">" buttons to add max/min amount of items (like vanilla << and >> buttons)
